subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Evgeni Malkin tied a career high with 5 points, Sidney Crosby extended his scoring streak to 21 games with a goal and two assists and the Pittsburgh Penguins beat the visiting Phoenix Coyotes, 6-1.
snippet: Evgeni Malkin tied a career high with 5 points, Sidney Crosby extended his scoring streak to 21 games with a goal and two assists and the Pittsburgh Penguins beat the visiting Phoenix Coyotes, 6-1.
